short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Essay Eye - AI Powered Grading Assistant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform the Way You Evaluate Student Writing

Essay Eye revolutionizes how teachers assess student essays directly within Google Docs. Powered by advanced AI, it provides detailed feedback on grammar, structure, and creativity while aligning with educational rubrics. Save time, enhance feedback quality, and empower student growth—all with a single click.

Key Features:

• Automated grading aligned with educational standards.
• Instant, actionable feedback for student improvement.
• Easy integration with Google Docs for streamlined workflows.
• Take the hassle out of grading and focus on what truly matters: teaching.
